author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
After discussion at the [Tracking POG meeting on 17<sup>th</sup> July 2023](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1302649/#9-updates-on-the-online-beamsp), it was decided to revert the changes of the online BeamSpot fallback logic (used in HLT and Express) introduced in #41597. 
This PR:
 - Reverts commit 4b35c951a64f79cf4ad68b741b15eb7ccc57ce75 so that, when the ESProducer produces a fake BeamSpot, the framework will fallback to the DB, ie. to consuming the last result produced by the PCL
 - Promotes the `LogInfo`(s) in `OnlineBeamSpotESProducer.cc` to `LogWarning`(s) in order to better debug why sometimes HLT picks up the fake BeamSpot (see discussion in #41914)
 - Change in the `bsChoice` plot title to improve clarity

#### PR validation:
Code compiles +  run successfully:
```
cmsRun DQM/Integration/python/clients/onlinebeammonitor_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py unitTest=True
```

#### Backport:
Not a backport, but backports to the data-taking releases will be provided soon.

FYI @gennai @dzuolo @lguzzi
title: Revert BeamSpot fallback logic
